mc.name: Demonic Tutor
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Liliana learned the secrets she sought, but at a price that was etched on her fate.

mc.name: Lord of the Pit
mc.oracleText:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.
mc.flavorText: "My summoning begins your debt, planeswalker."

mc.name: Faith's Fetters
mc.oracleText:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent's activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities. If enchanted permanent is a creature, it can't attack or block.
mc.printedText:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters comes into play, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent's activated abilities can't be played unless they're mana abilities. If enchanted permanent is a creature, it can't attack or block.

mc.name: Stinkweed Imp
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.
Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.
Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

mc.name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
mc.oracleText: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
mc.printedText: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
mc.flavorText: "Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."

mc.name: Luminous Angel
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.
mc.flavorText: "The spread of evil's destruction shall always be matched by the rise of the noble fallen."

mc.name: Angel of Mercy
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Angel of Mercy comes into play, you gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText: Every tear shed is a drop of immortality.

mc.name: Angel's Feather
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a white spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: If taken, it cuts the hand that clutches it. If given, it heals the hand that holds it.

mc.name: Consume Spirit
mc.oracleText:
Spend only black mana on X.
Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.
mc.printedText:
Spend only black mana on X.
Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.
mc.flavorText:
"Your blood, your marrow, your spirit--all are mine."
--Mayvar, minion of Geth

mc.name: Cruel Edict
mc.oracleText: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
mc.printedText: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Choose your next words carefully. They will be your last."
--Phage the Untouchable

mc.name: Demon's Horn
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a black spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

mc.name: Dusk Imp
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Imps are just intelligent enough to have an understanding of cruelty.

mc.name: Icatian Priest
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}{W}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{W}{W}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Grelden knelt and felt the cool, dry hand of the priest on his brow. Hours later, when his wits returned, he was covered in his enemies' blood on the field of victory.

mc.name: Pacifism
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
mc.flavorText: Even those born to battle could only lay their blades at Akroma's feet.

mc.name: Reya Dawnbringer
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.flavorText: "You have not died until I consent."

mc.name: Serra Angel
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
mc.printedText: Flying, vigilance
mc.flavorText: Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.

mc.name: Serra's Embrace
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and vigilance.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and vigilance.
mc.flavorText: The touch of Serra's angels bears hopes aloft and empowers noble causes.

mc.name: Unholy Strength
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
mc.flavorText: Such power grows the body as it shrinks the soul.

mc.name: Venerable Monk
mc.oracleText: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: When Venerable Monk comes into play, you gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

mc.name: Cackling Imp
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Its laughter drives needles through your mind.

mc.name: Duress
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.printedText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.flavorText: "Change your mind, or I'll change it for you."

mc.name: Marble Diamond
mc.oracleText:
Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Marble Diamond comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Serra Advocate
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: An angel's blessing prepares a soldier for war better than a thousand military drills.

mc.name: Sustainer of the Realm
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: You may break her shield, but you'll never break her spirit.

mc.name: Abyssal Specter
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
mc.flavorText: To gaze under its hood is to invite death.

mc.name: Angelic Page
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

mc.name: Fallen Angel
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me."

mc.name: Healing Salve
mc.oracleText: Choose one -- Target player gains 3 life; or prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText: Choose one -- Target player gains 3 life; or prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

mc.name: Foul Imp
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Foul Imp comes into play, you lose 2 life.
mc.flavorText: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.

mc.name: Angelic Benediction
mc.oracleText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.
mc.printedText:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Even in single combat, I am never alone."
--Rafiq of the Many

mc.name: Angelsong
mc.oracleText:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: Clash of sword and cry of beast fall mute when angels sound the call to prayer.

mc.name: Kuro, Pitlord
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Kuro, Pitlord unless you pay {B}{B}{B}{B}.
Pay 1 life: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Kuro, Pitlord unless you pay {B}{B}{B}{B}.
Pay 1 life: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Oni Possession
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample.
Enchanted creature is a Demon Spirit.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample.
Enchanted creature is a Demon Spirit.

mc.name: Otherworldly Journey
mc.oracleText: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.printedText: Remove target creature from the game. At end of turn, return that card to play under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.flavorText:
"The landscape shimmered and I felt a chill breeze. When my vision cleared, I found myself alone among the corpses of my fallen friends."
--Journal found in Numai

mc.name: Demon's Jester
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Hellbent -- Demon's Jester gets +2/+1 as long as you have no cards in hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Hellbent -- Demon's Jester gets +2/+1 as long as you have no cards in hand.
mc.flavorText: They knock 'em dead, with or without the punch line.

mc.name: Dark Ritual
mc.oracleText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"Leshrac, my liege, grant me the power I am due."
--Lim-Dul, the Necromancer

mc.name: Soot Imp
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever a player casts a nonblack spell, that player loses 1 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever a player plays a nonblack spell, that player loses 1 life.
mc.flavorText:
"If one gets in your chimney, you're going to need a long wick and a barrel of bangstuff to get it out."
--Hob Heddil

mc.name: Charging Paladin
mc.oracleText: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

mc.name: Daggerclaw Imp
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Daggerclaw Imp can't block.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Daggerclaw Imp can't block.
mc.flavorText: The Simic use the claws as scalpels, while the Rakdos use them for tattooing and torture. The Gruul use them to pick their teeth after lunching on the rest of the carcass.

mc.name: Dark Banishing
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"Ha, banishment? Be merciful, say 'death,'
For exile hath more terror in his look,
Much more than death."
--William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

mc.name: Breeding Pit
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Breeding Pit unless you pay {B}{B}.
At the beginning of your end step, put a 0/1 black Thrull creature token onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Breeding Pit unless you pay {B}{B}.
At the end of your turn, put a 0/1 black Thrull creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: The thrulls bred at a terrifying pace. In the end, they overwhelmed the Order of the Ebon Hand.

mc.name: Barter in Blood
mc.oracleText: Each player sacrifices two creatures.
mc.printedText: Each player sacrifices two creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"In the game of conquest, who cares about the pawns if the king yet reigns?"
--Geth, keeper of the Vault

mc.name: Promise of Power
mc.oracleText:
Choose one -- You draw five cards and you lose 5 life; or put an X/X black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the number of cards in your hand as the token enters the battlefield.
Entwine {4} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
mc.printedText:
Choose one -- You draw five cards and you lose 5 life; or put a black Demon creature token with flying into play with power and toughness each equal to the number of cards in your hand as the token comes into play.
Entwine {4} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

mc.name: Reiver Demon

Flying

mc.printedText:
Flying
When Reiver Demon comes into play, if you played it from your hand, destroy all nonartifact, nonblack creatures. They can't be regenerated.

mc.name: Overeager Apprentice

mc.printedText: Discard a card, Sacrifice Overeager Apprentice: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Slow and steady may not always win the race, but at least it doesn't end up splattered on the walls.

Enchant creature

mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 as long as it's white. Otherwise, it gets -2/-1.
mc.flavorText:
"The light of an angel's glance is warm, but her fixed stare blinds and burns."
--Calexis, deacon of the New Order of Serra

mc.name: Corrupt
mc.oracleText: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
mc.printedText: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
mc.flavorText: There are things beneath the murk for whom the bog is a stew, a thin broth in need of meat.

mc.name: Twilight Shepherd
mc.oracleText:
Flying, vigilance
When Twilight Shepherd enters the battlefield, return to your hand all cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
Persist (When this creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
mc.printedText:
Flying, vigilance
When Twilight Shepherd comes into play, return to your hand all cards in your graveyard put there from play this turn.
Persist (When this creature is put into a graveyard from play, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to play under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

mc.name: Angelic Protector

Flying

mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait."
--Crovax

mc.name: Souldrinker
mc.oracleText: Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Souldrinker.
mc.printedText: Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Souldrinker.
mc.flavorText: Don't drink and thrive.

mc.name: Abyssal Gatekeeper

mc.printedText: When Abyssal Gatekeeper is put into a graveyard from play, each player sacrifices a creature.

"There are two ways for me to pass this gate. One involves you remaining conscious."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight
